titleStmt.title: Iohn Taylors manifestation and iust vindication against Iosua Church his exclamation, with a true relation of Church his generation, with his soule combination, with a pretence of reformation, of his wrong'd occupation, hath brought all out of fashion.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

notesStmt.note: Church was a hostile waterman. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
